attributes.action: introduce, to the mainland, the "R Plate" system in use on both the Isle of Man and Northern Ireland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To limit inexperienced motorists to the parameters already in force away from the mainland.  Would is likely to reduce the number of fatalities caused by young drivers carrying passengers, reduce national overall fuel consumption.  Preventing young drivers from driving at high speeds on major roads would come some way towards introducing a 50mph speed limit on rural roads.
